MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL53 postcode area of Abersoch, affecting properties in Benar Headland and surrounding streets. It  was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.45PM due to a damaged underground cable. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 6.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.06PM on 13th January 2021.
